Room.Name: Paladin Training Room
Room.ShortDescription: The holy order of knighthood welcomes you as an advancing member.
Room.LongDescription: You have successfully defeated the Red Knight and may take you place as an advance Paladin in the service of God. Remember, never flee from evil, and always defend the weak and innocent. Search out evil in all its many forms, and an angel will be your strong sword arm as you do battle. Soon you may serve the kingdom of Lyanden.
